action.name: Practice Teamwork
action.requirement: You and at least one ally are taking a teamwork downtime activity, they do not need to be for the same feat but all must meet the prerequisites.
entries: You spend time training for certain situations in combat. Choose one of the following teamwork feats for which you meet the prerequisites: Brawny Teamwork, Cunning Teamwork, Illusive Teamwork, or Nimble Teamwork. After three days of downtime, you gain the respective teamwork feat.
By spending additional time training, you can increase the benefit of the teamwork feat:

items: {@b 5 additional days} You can use the Honed Teamwork effect.
{@b 10 additional days} You can use the Excellent Teamwork effect.
{@b 20 additional days} You can use the Perfect Teamwork effect.

action.name: Dual Studies
action.requirement: You and at least one ally are taking a teamwork downtime activity, they do not need to be for the same feat but all must meet the prerequisites.
entries: You spend time sharing knowledge with your allies. Choose one of the following teamwork feats for which you meet the prerequisites: Remedy Lethologica or Shared Body of Knowledge
By spending additional time training, you can increase the benefit of the teamwork feat:

items: {@b 5 additional days} You can use the Honed Teamwork effect.
{@b 15 additional days} You can use the Excellent Teamwork effect.
{@b 30 additional days} You can use the Perfect Teamwork effect.

action.name: Certified First Aid
action.requirement: You and at least one ally are taking a teamwork downtime activity, they do not need to be for the same feat but all must meet the prerequisites.
entries: You spend time sharing knowledge with your allies. Choose one of the following teamwork feats for which you meet the prerequisites: Nurse's Aid
By spending additional time training, you can increase the benefit of the teamwork feat:

items: {@b 5 additional days} You can use the Honed Teamwork effect.
{@b 10 additional days} You can use the Excellent Teamwork effect.
{@b 20 additional days} You can use the Perfect Teamwork effect if you have Battle Medicine.
